name: @geut/choo-slides
description: Create your presentation in a fun way

scripts.build: browserify --bare -t sheetify/transform -p [ css-extract -o bundle.css ] index.js -o bundle.js
scripts.build-alt: browserify -t sheetify/transform -t babelify --presets [ env, 'targets': {'browsers': ['last 2 versions']}] -p [ css-extract -o bundle.css ] --standalone chooSlides index.js | uglifyjs -c > bundle.js

author: GEUT
